name: Soba Noodles
desc: A plain and simple noodle dish. The buckwheat noodles are boiled and then cooled. Their texture is smooth and they have just the right amount of toughness. The inexpensive ingredients and simple make of this dish have made it very popular amongst Inazumans.

value.text: Restores 9% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 260 HP every 5s for 30s.

customize.name: Recipe: Soba Noodles
customize.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Soba Noodles.

customize.name: Flour
customize.desc: A powder ground from wheat. No matter what it goes into, it brings a sense of satisfaction to the diner.

customize.name: Seagrass
customize.desc: A plant that grows in shallow seas. It adds a unique flavor to dishes.

customize.name: Delicious Soba Noodles
customize.desc: A plain and simple noodle dish. The unique flavor of buckwheat has been maximized, and as the springy noodles slip past your throat, they leave behind a gentle aftertaste, like an old song floating through a tranquil courtyard.

customize.name: Suspicious Soba Noodles
customize.desc: A plain and simple noodle dish. The rough texture drags itself across your tongue and leaves a bitter aftertaste after you forcibly swallow. Can this... stuff still be considered noodles?
